###### cmake
`cmake -B build -DENABLE_Sanitizer_Address=OFF`
`cmake --build build -j16`
###### 输出repo库路径
`repo forall -c 'echo "repository:$REPO_PROJECT"; pwd; git xxx' `
###### 火焰图
`perf record -e cpu-clock -g -p `pidof MXNavi` 
`/mnt/software/Perf/FlameGraph/stackcollapse-perf.pl perf.unfold &> perf.folded`
`/mnt/software/Perf/FlameGraph/flamegraph.pl perf.folded > perf.svg`
###### 编译重定向
`make -j16 2>&1 | tee build.txt`

###### bcompare 破解
`rm -rf ~/.config/bcompare/`
`cd /usr/lib/beyondcompare/`
`sudo sed -i "s/keexjEP3t4Mue23hrnuPtY4TdcsqNiJL--Tsk7YBTz0WpSpoYyPgx6Iki5KLtQ5G-aKP9eysnkuOAkrvHU8bLbGtZteGwJarev03PhfCioJL4OSqsmQGEvDbHFEbNl1qJtdwEriR+VNZts9vNNLk7UGfeNwIiqpxjk4Mn09nmSd8FhM4ifvcaIbNCRoMPGl6KU12iseSe+w+1kFsLhX+OhQM8WXcWV10cGqBzQE9OqOLUcg9n0krrR3KrohstS9smTwEx9olyLYppvC0p5i7dAx2deWvM1ZxKNs0BvcXGukR+/g" BCompare
`
打开软件输入key激活
